item.title: News - Installation and start-up of pellet production plant in Vinnytsia, UA â€“ 08.2013
item.content: <p>We would like to inform that Andrzej Rogulski DORAN in july 2013 completed the other project for construction of biomass processing plant in Ukraine.</p> <p>More information can be found at our website dedicated to projects being realized - <a href="projects-ltdvinnytsa-pelletplant">click here</a>.</p>
item.author: doran
